that will receive payment","_link":"IPFS or HTTP link with proposal's description","_requestedAmount":"Tokens requested","_title":"Title of the proposal"}},"allowRecoverability(address)":{"details":"By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable","params":{"token":"Token address that would be recovered"},"return":"bool whether the app allows the recovery"},"calculateConviction(uint64,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Conviction formula: a^t * y(0) + x * (1 - a^t) / (1 - a) Solidity implementation: y = (2^128 * a^t * y0 + x * D * (2^128 - 2^128 * a^t) / (D - aD) + 2^127) / 2^128","params":{"_lastConv":"Last conviction record","_oldAmount":"Amount of tokens staked until now","_timePassed":"Number of blocks since last conviction record"},"return":"Current conviction"},"calculateThreshold(uint256)":{"details":"Formula: \u03c1 * supply / (1 - a) / (\u03b2 - requestedAmount / total)**2 For the Solidity implementation we amplify \u03c1 and \u03b2 and simplify the formula: weight = \u03c1 * D maxRatio = \u03b2 * D decay = a * D threshold = weight * supply * D ** 2 * funds ** 2 / (D - decay) / (maxRatio * funds - requestedAmount * D) ** 2","params":{"_requestedAmount":"Requested amount of tokens on certain proposal"},"return":"Threshold a proposal's conviction should surpass in order to be able to executed it."},"canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[])":{"details":"Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app","params":{"_params":"Permission params for the role","_role":"Role on this app","_sender":"Sender of the call"},"return":"Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet."},"executeProposal(uint256,bool)":{"details":"...by sending `@tokenAmount((self.requestToken(): address), self.getPropoal(_id): ([uint256], address, uint256, uint256, uint64, bool))` to `self.getPropoal(_id): (uint256, [address], uint256, uint256, uint64, bool)`","params":{"_id":"Proposal id","_withdrawIfPossible":"True if sender's staked tokens should be withdrawed after execution"}},"getInitializationBlock()":{"return":"Block number in which the contract was initialized"},"getProposal(uint256)":{"details":"Get proposal parameters","params":{"_id":"Proposal id"},"return":"Requested amountBeneficiary addressCurrent total stake of tokens on this proposalConviction this proposal had last time calculateAndSetConviction was calledBlock when calculateAndSetConviction was calledTrue if proposal has already been executed"},"getProposalVoterStake(address)":{"params":{"_voter":"Entity address that previously might voted on that proposal"},"return":"Current amount of staked tokens by voter on proposal"},"getProposalVoterStake(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_id":"Proposal id","_voter":"Entity address that previously params._link: IPFS or HTTP link with proposal's description

allowRecoverability(address).details: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable

params.token: Token address that would be recovered

allowRecoverability(address).return: bool whether the app allows the recovery

calculateConviction(uint64,uint256,uint2.details: Conviction formula: a^t * y(0) + x * (1 - a^t) / (1 - a) Solidity implementation: y = (2^128 * a^t * y0 + x * D * (2^128 - 2^128 * a^t) / (D - aD) + 2^127) / 2^128

params._oldAmount: Amount of tokens staked until now
params._timePassed: Number of blocks since last conviction record

calculateThreshold(uint256).details: Formula: ρ * supply / (1 - a) / (β - requestedAmount / total)**2 For the Solidity implementation we amplify ρ and β and simplify the formula: weight = ρ * D maxRatio = β * D decay = a * D threshold = weight * supply * D ** 2 * funds ** 2 / (D - decay) / (maxRatio * funds - requestedAmount * D) ** 2

params._requestedAmount: Requested amount of tokens on certain proposal

calculateThreshold(uint256).return: Threshold a proposal's conviction should surpass in order to be able to executed it.

canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).details: Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app
canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).return: Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet.

executeProposal(uint256,bool).details: ...by sending `@tokenAmount((self.requestToken(): address), self.getPropoal(_id): ([uint256], address, uint256, uint256, uint64, bool))` to `self.getPropoal(_id): (uint256, [address], uint256, uint256, uint64, bool)`

params._withdrawIfPossible: True if sender's staked tokens should be withdrawed after execution

getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

getProposal(uint256).return: Requested amountBeneficiary addressCurrent total stake of tokens on this proposalConviction this proposal had last time calculateAndSetConviction was calledBlock when calculateAndSetConviction was calledTrue if proposal has already been executed

params._voter: Entity address that previously might voted on that proposal

getProposalVoterStake(address).return: Current amount of staked tokens by voter on proposal

params._voter: Entity address that previously might voted on that proposal

getProposalVoterStake(uint256,address).return: Current amount of staked tokens by voter on proposal

getRecoveryVault().details: Get the recovery vault for the app
getRecoveryVault().return: Recovery vault address for the app

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

params._token: Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

getProposalVoterStake(address).notice: Get total stake of voter `_voter` on proposals

getProposalVoterStake(uint256,address).notice: Get stake of voter `_voter` on proposal #`_id`

stakeAllToProposal(uint256).notice: Stake all my `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens on proposal #`_id`

transferToVault(address).notice: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.

withdrawAllFromProposal(uint256).notice: Withdraw all `(self.stakeToken(): address).symbol(): string` tokens previously staked on proposal #`_id`

withdrawFromProposal(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw `@tokenAmount((self.stakeToken(): address), _amount)` previously staked on proposal #`_id`
